```{r}
library(EnhancedVolcano)
```

```{r}
p2 <- EnhancedVolcano(UpGeneFrame,
    lab = UpGeneFrame$symbol,              
    x = 'log2FoldChange',
    y = 'pvalue')

    p2
```

```{r}
p2 <- EnhancedVolcano(DownGeneFrame,
    lab = DownGeneFrame$symbol,              
    x = 'log2FoldChange',
    y = 'pvalue')

    p2
```
